attributes.action: Make every Friday a half day
attributes.additional_details: Because I think that it is a necessary idea that could ease a lot of peoples suffering
attributes.background: I would like them to understand that Friday is a stressful day for everyone and a lot of commute  so I am proposing that all work and school day finish at 12:30 every Friday so people can have a well deserved rest and Friday evening are not a nightmare to get home

rejection.details:
Deciding whether to allow staff to work a four day week is a matter for employers, not the UK Government or the House of Commons. In any case, employees are already entitled to request a four day working week.

UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a related action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611729
